prereg_registration_initiated: A user submitted for review to the Preregistration Challenge a registration of a project
created_from: A user created a project based on a template
pointer_created: A user created a link to a project
pointer_forked: A user forked a link to a project
pointer_removed: A user removed a link to a project
group_added: A user added a group to a project
group_removed: A user removed a group from a project
group_updated: A user changed a group's permissions to a project
made_public: A user made a project public
made_private: A user made a project private
tag_added: A user added a tag to a project
tag_removed: A user removed a tag from a project
edit_title: A user changed the title of a project
edit_description: A user edited the description of a project
category_updated: A user changed the category of a project
article_doi_updated: A user changed the article_doi of a project
updated_fields: A user changed the ${updated_fields} for a project
external_ids_added: A user created external identifiers on a project
custom_citation_added: A user created a custom citation for a project
custom_citation_edited: A user updated a custom citation for a project
custom_citation_removed: A user removed a custom citation from a project
contributor_added: A user added contributor(s) to a project
contributor_removed: A user removed contributor(s) from a project
contributors_reordered: A user reordered contributors for a project
permissions_updated: A user changed permissions for a project
made_contributor_visible: A user made contributor(s) visible on a project
made_contributor_invisible: A user made contributor(s) invisible on a project
wiki_updated: A user updated a wiki page of a project
wiki_deleted: A user deleted a wiki page of a project
wiki_renamed: A user renamed a wiki page of a project
made_wiki_public: A user made the wiki of a project publicly editable
made_wiki_private: A user made the wiki of a project privately editable
addon_added: A user added an addon to a project
addon_removed: A user removed an addon from a project
folder_created: A user created a folder in a project
file_added: A user added a file to a project
file_updated: A user updated a file in a project
file_removed: A user removed a file from a project
file_restored: A user restored a file from a project
file_metadata_updated: A user updated the file metadata for a file
checked_out: A user checked out a file from a project
checked_in: A user checked in a file to a project
comment_added: A user added a comment to a project
comment_removed: A user deleted a comment from a project
comment_restored: A user restored a comment in a project
comment_updated: A user updated a comment on a project
embargo_initiated: A user initiated an embargoed registration of a project
embargo_approved: A user approved an embargoed registration of a project
embargo_approved_no_user: Embargo of registration of a project approved
embargo_cancelled: A user cancelled an embargoed registration of a project
embargo_completed: A user completed an embargo of a project
retraction_initiated: A user initiated a withdrawal of a registration of a project
retraction_initiated_no_user: A withdrawal of a registration of a project was proposed
retraction_approved: A user approved a withdrawal of a registration of a project
retraction_approved_no_user: A withdrawal of a registration of ${node} was approved
retraction_cancelled: A user cancelled a withdrawal of a registration of a project
external_registration_created: Registration was created on an external registry.
external_registration_imported: Registration was imported to OSF from an external registry.
registration_initiated: A user initiated a registration of a project
registration_approved: A user approved a registration of a project
registration_approved_no_user: Registration of a project was approved
registration_cancelled: A user cancelled a registration of a project
node_forked: A user created fork from a project
node_access_requests_enabled: A user enabled access requests for a project
node_access_requests_disabled: A user disabled access requests for a project
license_changed: A user updated the license of a project
file_tag_added: A user added a tag to a file in OSF Storage in a project
file_tag_removed: A user removed tag from a file in OSF Storage in a project
osf_storage_file_added: A user added a file to OSF Storage in a project
osf_storage_folder_created: A user created a folder in OSF Storage in a project
osf_storage_file_updated: A user updated a file in OSF Storage in a project
osf_storage_file_removed: A user removed a file from OSF Storage in a project
affiliated_institution_added: A user added an affiliation to a project
affiliated_institution_removed: A user removed an affiliation from a project
preprint_initiated: A user made a project a preprint
preprint_file_updated: A user updated the primary file of a preprint
preprint_license_updated: A user updated the license of a preprint
view_only_link_added: A user created a view-only link to a project
view_only_link_removed: A user removed a view-only link to a project
